entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco is introduced as one of the masked Death Eaters that Harry and Ron are fighting against. He is described as pleading with another Death Eater on the upper landing.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who Stunned a Death Eater as they passed. He is also directing a Stunning Spell at other Death Eaters.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as the one who punched Draco from under his Cloak, saving Harry's life.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is introduced as a Death Eater in combat with Flitwick near the front doors.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Flitwick is introduced as a professor who is dueling Yaxley near the front doors.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is introduced as an auror who is dueling a masked Death Eater right beside Flitwick and Yaxley.

entities.name: snargaluff juice
entities.description: Snargaluff juice is mentioned as the substance that Harry and Ron are slipping in as they run through the fight.

relationships.description: Harry saved Draco's life by Stunning a Death Eater that was attacking him.
Ron also saved Draco's life by punching him from under his Cloak.
Harry is dueling Yaxley near the front doors.
Flitwick is dueling Yaxley near the front doors.
Kingsley is dueling a masked Death Eater right beside Flitwick and Yaxley.
